segments.text: I see this woman in the kitchen, totally focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a dress, looking so ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out everywhere, making a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in it, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to be a disaster if she slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at those kids over there by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a stool that's wobbling like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, grabbing snacks without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't tip; they'd fall right into that wet mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all calm and pretty.
segments.speaker: PAR
